bcbioRNASeq 0.2.6

Update an Object to Its Current Class Definition

Source: R/updateObject-methods.R
updateObject.Rd

Update old objects created by the bcbioRNASeq package. The session information metadata is preserved from the time when the bcbio data was originally loaded into R.

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
updateObject(object, rowRanges = NULL)

Arguments

object

Object.
rowRanges

GRanges or NULL. Row annotations. Since we converted to RangedSummarizedExperiment in v0.2.0, this option had to be added to enable updating of newly required rowRanges() slot. Objects that are >= v0.2 don't require this argument and it can be left NULL.

Value

bcbioRNASeq.

Legacy bcbioRNADataSet class

Support for bcbioRNADataSet objects was dropped in v0.2.0 of the package. If you need to load one of these objects, please install an older release.

Legacy objects created with bcbioRnaseq

The previous bcbioRnaseq package (note case) must be reinstalled to load objects from versions <= 0.0.20. We changed the name of the package to bcbioRNASeq starting in v0.0.21.

See also

Other S4 Object: bcbioRNASeq, coerce, extract, show

Examples

updateObject(bcb_small)
#> Upgrading from 0.2.3 to 0.2.6
#> tx2gene: Renaming `txID` to `transcriptID`
#> Generating DESeqDataSet with DESeq2 1.20.0
#> using just counts from tximport
#> estimating size factors
#> estimating dispersions
#> gene-wise dispersion estimates
#> mean-dispersion relationship
#> final dispersion estimates
#> fitting model and testing
#> bcbioRNASeq 0.2.6
#> class: RangedSummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 500 6 
#> metadata(31): version level ... subset previousVersion
#> assays(6): counts tpm ... rlog vst
#> rownames(500): ENSMUSG00000000088 ENSMUSG00000000326 ...
#>   ENSMUSG00000114367 ENSMUSG00000114458
#> rowData names(7): geneID geneName ... entrezID broadClass
#> colnames(6): control_rep1 control_rep2 ... fa_day7_rep2 fa_day7_rep3
#> colData names(25): sampleName day ... x5x3Bias xGC
#> ====================================================================================================
#> Upload Dir: "/mnt/O2/bcbio/bcbioRNASeq/F1000v2/GSE65267-merged/final"
#> Upload Date: 2018-03-18
#> R Load Date: 2018-08-09
#> Level: "genes"
#> Caller: "salmon"
#> Organism: "Mus musculus"
#> Interesting Groups: "treatment"
#> AnnotationHub: "AH57770"
#> Ensembl Release: "90"
#> Genome Build: "GRCm38"
